DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate overall pain relief single dose PF-05089771 placebo follow third molar extraction .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Of PF-05089771 In Treating Postoperative Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Oral surgery remove 2 unilateral third molar teeth .
